duties_responsibilities.duty: Form and lead project teams, develop technical project plans, and manage project budgets.
Report project status to Leadership Team, communicate, document, and manage project activities according to good project management practices.
Provide technical project management support for new product introductions, site to site technology transfers, and continuous improvement projects.
Deliver the portfolio of new products to the business by leading the co-development and launch teams.
Provide project leadership for technology transfers between manufacturing sites.
Coordinate the site team to develop project plans in support of the business strategy and prioritize projects appropriately within the platform.
Plan and budget project resources required to execute projects and maintain project management best practices globally.
Train and support others in project management tools and best practices and report out frequently on the progress of projects to senior management.
Work with other team leaders on sharing of technical knowledge across the businesses supported by the team.
Responsible for working with Regulatory groups to develop and execute strategies for filing, defending, and launching new products.
Serve as a technical liaison to both internal and external sites as needed.

education_certification.credential: PMP certification required. Bachelor's degree in a related field (Master's preferred).
Proficient with Microsoft Project software and CAD software. Injection molding knowledge is a plus. Working knowledge of key regulatory authorities (USDA, EMA, VMD, and FDA).
